title: This yearâ€™s MacBook Air could feature a new design and a larger display
content:
Apple — as always — has been busy at work. Just yesterday we learned that the company could be working on a MacBook Air with a 15-inch display. It could reveal this anticipated model as soon as 2023. New reports are now hinting at what the company could be preparing for this year’s potential MacBook

The post This year’s MacBook Air could feature a new design and a larger display appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A new report states that the upcoming Apple MacBook Air of this year could feature a new design and a slightly larger display.
